column1: He's already got $3 trillion, according to The Washington Post, of expenses that he's put on the line from his convention and the promises of this campaign, none of which are paid for. [SEP] Not one of them are paid for. [SEP] The fact is that the president is
column3: the largest deficits in American history. [SEP] He's broken the pay-as-you-go rules. [SEP] I have a record of fighting for fiscal responsibility.
